title: Ms
name: Natalie Ali
bio: Natalie Ali has over 15 years of experience in the retail industry and has led the North Division to new heights.

title: Mr
name: Toms Stewart
position: Senior Vice President, General Merchandising Manager
bio: Toms Stewart has over 10 years of experience in the merchandising industry and has led the company's merchandising efforts to great success.

title: Mr
name: Jacob John
bio: Jacob John has over 12 years of experience in finance and accounting and has been instrumental in the company's financial success.

title: Mr
name: Aaron Smith
position: Senior Vice President, Supply Chain Operation Support
bio: Aaron Smith has over 15 years of experience in supply chain management and has been a driving force behind the company's operational efficiency.

title: Mr
name: Brandon Waron
position: Senior Vice President, Pro Services and Online
bio: Brandon Waron has over 10 years of experience in e-commerce and has been instrumental in the growth of the company's online sales.

title: Ms
name: Bree Rose
position: Senior Vice President, Technology E-commerce Marketing and Merchandising
bio: Bree Rose has over 12 years of experience in marketing and technology and has been instrumental in the company's digital transformation.
